message: Let's start fair. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. We can negotiate if you think it's unfair.
I appreciate your fair offer, but I think we can do a bit better for both of us. I propose a 51/49 split in my favor.  Let's see if we can find a mutually agreeable solution.

I understand your desire for a bigger share, but a 51/49 split doesn't seem fair to me. I'm willing to compromise a bit and offer a 53/47 split.  Let's settle this quickly before inflation eats away at our gains.
